name: Incoming Transmission (kroltan)
description:
Objective:

Connect the ship to the station by placing satellites in orbit, and try to get the best coverage for a fast transfer!

Controls:

Left Click: Place satellite
Right Click: Remove satellite
Scroll Wheel: Zoom

Authors:

Artist: Valente de Moraes
UI Design: Lucas "pixelikas" Naspolini
Programming: Leonardo "kroltan" Giovanni Scur
